name: Yeongdeung Halmang
shortLoreBlurb: Yeongdeung Halmang is a deity from Korea (Jeju) tied to wind goddess, fisherfolk. Myths connect them with tempests and rulership.
description: Yeongdeung Halmang is a deity from Korea (Jeju) tied to wind goddess, fisherfolk. Myths connect them with tempests and rulership.
